name: cmdmix
description: Butt in that value to your line of commands

scripts.test: echo 'Ehhh - this has been manually tested pretty well - kind of... you know...' && exit 1
scripts.test-format: yarn pretty-since-push --list-different || echo 'Please correct file formatting using `yarn format` and try again.'
scripts.pretty-since-push: { git diff --name-only --diff-filter=d origin/master ; git diff --name-only --diff-filter=d --staged origin/master ; } | sort | uniq | grep -E '\.(scss|css|js|ts|vue|json)$' | xargs prettier
scripts.goto: cmdmix 'git fetch && git checkout %1 && git pull'
